pci_workflow_create_type_description: A workflow describes one or more actions.
pci_workflow_create_type_instance_backup: This workflow generates instance backups. The backups can then be used to start new instances.
pci_workflow_create_schedule_rotate_desc: A backup is taken every day between 22:00 and 06:00, and the rotation maintains a log of the {{ numEntries }} latest entries. When the new backup is taken, the previous one is deleted.
pci_workflow_create_schedule_custom_desc: Choose the scheduling yourself (in UNIX Cron format), the number of rotations, and the maximum executions you want.
pci_workflow_add_success: The '{{ workflowName }}' workflow schedule has been created.
pci_workflow_add_error: Unable to create workflow schedule: {{ message }}
pci_workflow_create_price_title: Each backup will be billed at
pci_workflow_create_cron_month_helper_1: 1-12, where 1 is January, 2 is February, etc.
pci_workflow_create_cron_month_helper_2: Chains of three upper-case and lower-case letters, based on the month name. E.g.: {{ monthNameExample }}.
pci_workflow_create_cron_dow_helper_1: 0-6, where 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
pci_workflow_create_cron_dow_helper_2: Chains of three upper-case and lower-case letters based on the name of the day: {{ weekNameExample }}.
pci_workflow_create_execution_count_desc: Number of executions to process before the end of the task. Zero (0) means that the task will never end.
pci_workflow_create_name_help: May only contain numbers, letters, underscores, dashes and full stops.
pci_workflow_create_region_not_supported: Workflow schedule is not taken into account for the resources of the {{ regionName }} region
pci_workflow_create_monthly_backup_price: Each backup will be billed at: {{ price }} ex. VAT/month/GB
pci_projects_project_workflow_instance_s: The automatic backup applies strictly to data on your instanceâ€™s local disk. NVMe drive data will not be backed up.
